name: DU/ER Performance Denim Slim Pants - Men's
description:
Look good and be comfortable all day long. These pants give you the style of traditional denim, but also come with the bonus benefits of today's technical fabrics.Made from organic cotton blended with Coolmax® polyester and LYCRA® spandex.Fabric helps wick moisture away and has good stretch.Flat-stitched side seams hug the body and don't cause hot spots  on the move.Slim fitting, but not a skinny jeans fit.Invisible gusset for comfort.

        Sustainability
